text: axiom is a customer intelligence company
that offers data-driven solutions axiom
has a large catalog of audience
propensity models we have around five to
five thousand of these in our catalog
each of this these models have to be
scored on a large 2 terabyte data set
and we generate around 3 trillion
propensity scores scoring models on this
infrastructure comes with significant
operational overhead as it requires
constant monitoring and in some cases
manual resubmission of jobs when we
encounter errors we decided to
build an end-to-end machine learning
platform using amazon sagemaker it's a
one-stop-shop solution for
model training model deployment model
inferencing and quality assurance
axiom's ml platform solution enables us
to quickly
build and deliver
syndicated and custom audiences at scale
and it significantly improves our speed
to market for our data products it
offers us flexibility to refresh our
existing models as quickly as possible
offers a significant agility to be able
to
if there is a new consumer trend
emerging we can capture the data
model it out
create a new product offering and ship
it to our clients
